g.text: Chest-mounted assistive navigation: real-time obstacle & object detection with computer vision, LiDAR, and ultrasonics.
Haptic and audio feedback for indoor guidance.

ENSC 405/440 Capstone · On-device processing · Modular hardware · 8–10h battery · Sustainability & safety focused
